name: Grandma? What a big knife you have
name_original: Grandma? What a big knife you have
description:
Instructions: This is a typing game - good luck.

Also there is a bug with re-trying, unfortunately the only work around is to refresh the browser page.

Second game and second game jam

Ran into time issues - barely made submission within the last 5 minutes! Still, I had a lot of fun and I would do it again. 

Unfortunately a few bugs due to lack of time and play-testing.

Source in all of its glory here - https://github.com/dimitriadamou/Horror-Jam

Credits

- The Lurking Fea (H.P Lovecraft)

- SFX and Graphics made by my friend (will update with credit if he gives me a link/handle)

- Clock Tower OST

- Muriel from courage the cowardly dog
